location.sjis: プロスバンの町 商店通り

dialogue.sjis: お休みです ごめんなさいね
dialogue.ascii: We're closed for the day! Sorry for the inconvenience!

dialogue.sjis: あ、鍛冶師の人だね 商売したかったけど 今日は売り物が無いの
dialogue.ascii: Oh! You're a Craftknight, right? I wanted to talk business with you, but I'm sold out at the moment

dialogue.sjis: 残念 また今度会ったら 何か買ってね
dialogue.ascii: I'm so, so sorry! I'll be stocked up next time, so please buy my wares soon!

dialogue.sjis: 何か最近忙しくて ふぁ〜
dialogue.ascii: I have so much to do recently Sigh

dialogue.sjis: 茶色の子ネコを探しています にぼしが好物です 見つけた方は連絡ください
dialogue.ascii: I'm looking for a brown kitten. I think it likes dried sardines? Let me know if you find it.

dialogue.sjis: 福引きであなたの運を 試してみませんか？ 毎日抽選！空くじ無し！！
dialogue.ascii: Care to try our Lucky Draw? It's available all day, everyday! Guaranteed no losing tickets!

dialogue.sjis: ジェイド様を見守る会 ついに結成！ 会員募集中！
dialogue.ascii: The Almighty JadeSupport Squad has been officially formed! We're looking for members!
